item.description:
Back by popular demand! Our seconda serata insieme. Rosaria has done it again! Mille grazie! This time Rosaria Tenace will present a paper she wrote recently on the:  Dialetti parlati in Italia - Dialects spoken in Italy - At the end, there will be Q and A. She's really good by the way. 

It's right down the road from where we meet on a regular basis, Mozzicato's. This meetup is limited to 20 people.

6:05pm Rosaria Tenace presents Dialetti parlati in Italia

6:30pm social

7:00pm dinner

The cost is $12 per person which includes the following:

ANTIPASTO - Mixed Italian Affettati, Salame, Sopressata, Capocollo; - Formaggi, Olive, Verdure sott'olio (Pickled Italian vegetables), like peppers, eggplants, etc. - Crusty Italian bread.

PASTA: - Long Pasta: Spaghetti al Pomodoro and Basilico (in celebration of the Neapolitan cuisine) and Orecchiette with Broccoli Rape and Italian Sausage (in celebration of the Apulian cuisine) A glass of wine will also be served and it is included in the price of $12 per person.

Please RSVP if you are planning to come! An actual head count will be needed a couple of days before the event. Please have cash for Rosaria ready the night of our meetup. You will be responsible for $12 if you are a no show that evening.

This is must for those of you that have never attended one of our meetups! You wanted Italian culture, well here it is!!!!

Grazie e buona giornata! Lorenzo
item.name: 2nd Serata Insieme(evening together) Wed. May 9
